org.b3log.latke.repository.gae
类 GAERepository

java.lang.Object
  org.b3log.latke.repository.gae.GAERepository
所有已实现的接口：
org.b3log.latke.repository.Repository
public final class GAERepository
extends Object
implements org.b3log.latke.repository.Repository

Google App Engine repository implementation, wraps The Datastore Java API(Low-level API) of GAE.

Transaction

The invocation of add, update and remove MUST in a transaction. Invocation of method get (by id) in a transaction will try to get object from cache of the transaction, if not hit, retrieve object from transaction snapshot; if the invocation made is not in a transaction, retrieve object from datastore directly. See GAE 事务隔离 for more details.

Caching

Repository cache is used to cache the get and query results if enabled caching.

版本：
1.0.6.0, Jun 27, 2012
作者：
Liang Ding
另请参见：
Query, GAETransaction

update

public void update(String id,
                   org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
            throws org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException
Updates a certain json object by the specified id and the specified new json object.

The parent key of the entity to update is the default parent key.

Invokes this method for an non-existent entity will create a new entity in database, as the same effect of method add(org.json.JSONObject).

Update algorithm steps:

  1. Sets the specified id into the specified new json object
  2. Creates a new entity with the specified id
  3. Puts the entity into database

Note: the specified id is NOT the key of a database record, but the value of "oId" stored in database value entry of a record.

指定者：
接口 org.b3log.latke.repository.Repository 中的 update
参数：
id - the specified id
jsonObject - the specified new json object
抛出：
org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException - repository exception
另请参见：
Keys.OBJECT_ID

get

private org.json.JSONObject get(int currentPageNum,
                                int pageSize,
                                int pageCount,
                                Set<org.b3log.latke.repository.Projection> projections,
                                Map<String,org.b3log.latke.repository.SortDirection> sorts,
                                org.b3log.latke.repository.Filter filter,
                                String cacheKey)
                         throws org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException
Gets the result object by the specified current page number, page size, page count, sorts, filter and query cache key.

参数：
currentPageNum - the specified current page number
pageSize - the specified page size
pageCount - the specified page count
projections - the specified projections
sorts - the specified sorts
filter - the specified filter
cacheKey - the specified cache key of a query
返回：
the result object, see return of get(org.b3log.latke.repository.Query) for details
抛出：
org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException - repository exception

get

private org.json.JSONObject get(com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Query query,
                                int currentPageNum,
                                int pageSize,
                                int pageCount,
                                String cacheKey)
                         throws org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException
Gets result json object by the specified query, current page number, page size, page count and cache key.

If the specified page count equals to -1, this method will calculate the page count.

参数：
query - the specified query
currentPageNum - the specified current page number
pageSize - the specified page size
pageCount - the specified page count
cacheKey - the specified cache key of a query
返回：
for example, 
 {
     "pagination": {
       "paginationPageCount": 88250
     },
     "rslts": [{
         "oId": "...."
     }, ....]
 }
抛出：
org.b3log.latke.repository.RepositoryException - repository exception

a time millisecond string

getStartCursor

private com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Cursor getStartCursor(int currentPageNum,
                                                                 int pageSize,
                                                                 com.google.appengine.api.datastore.PreparedQuery preparedQuery)
Gets the end cursor of the specified current page number, page size and the prepared query.

参数：
currentPageNum - the specified current page number, MUST larger then 1
pageSize - the specified page size
preparedQuery - the specified prepared query
返回：
the start cursor
